data.title: Temenos t24 Jobs, Employment
data.meta_description: Search for jobs related to Temenos t24 or hire on the world's largest freelancing marketplace with 23m+ jobs. It's free to sign up and bid on jobs.

...- **Architectural Drawings**: Including floor plans, elevations, and sections that showcase the design intent and spatial layout. - **Structural Drawings**: Essential for ensuring the strength and integrity of the building, tailored to California's building codes. - **Electrical Drawings**: Detailing the electrical layout, receptacle placement, switches, lights, and other fixtures. - **T24 Plumbing and Civil**: Drawings that address the specifics of Title 24 regulations along with civil site work. I am aiming for **permit-ready drawings** to submit to the local authorities, so accuracy and attention to detail are paramount. I don't have existing blueprints, so I'm looking for someone who can take my ideas and translate them into professional plans. Ideal...

I need someone to put me on the first road to begin coding, by doing the following: 1. Provide me with a URL to download Temenos T24 Core Banking Software Evaluation 2. Guide on How to install it on my virtual or Windows 10 machine along with the client access 3. Access it through Terminal 4. Already installed Visual Studio Code and enabled MV Basic Extension but want to begin coding 5. Provide me with useful admin and coding manuals Thanks

Tracks industry trends and maintains knowledge of new technologies, advising leadership of opportunities to improve quality, reduce costs and/or create competitive advantages. Build and improve the performance and availability of hosted application services and infrastructure. Ensure information security best practices and policies are implemented in system designs. Integrate, install, configure, test and support hosted services/applications. $920 (Avg Bid)

Temenos AG, headquartered in Geneva, is the world leader in banking software, partnering with banks and other financial institutions to transform their businesses and stay ahead of a changing marketplace. Over 3,000 firms across the globe, including 41 of the top 50 banks, rely on Temenos to process both the daily transactions and client interactions of more than 500 million banking customers. Temenos offers cloud-native, cloud-agnostic front office and core banking, payments, fund management and wealth management software products enabling banks to deliver consistent, friction-less customer journeys and gain operational excellence. Must be situated in the US and CANADA

Over 3,000 firms across the globe, including 41 of the top 50 banks, rely on Temenos to process both the daily transactions and client interactions of more than 500 million banking customers. We are looking for a person who can audit/ test jBASE database for Temenos T24 application for a project we have with a bank in Nepal. This would be on a temporary hire (5-7 days). Person should be willing to travel. The person should be able to test for database hardening and should be able to cover the following testing: 1. Data integrity controls including master table updates 2. Database connectivity (interface) with external applications 3. Security of database file - control files, redo log files, archive log files, initialization files, configuration file, table space security etc. 4. Analysis of database architecture and design (to identify security gaps) 5. Database logical access controls (authorization, authentication, least privilege) 6. Database confidentiali...

$17 / hr (Avg Bid)

Incomplete project. Device and software are designed around a Mantracourt 2.4ghz T24 telemetry product. In this case a force gauge for a medical application. The software must perform the following tasks: Run on Win10 platform Must have a GUI suitable for a tablet. Create a new file with each instance using data input and validation. Calibrate the device Log force over time with an appropriate scale, being displayed on a graph. Be able to pause and restart. Print off the final graph Save data to usb. This software has mostly been developed however it has stability issues, bugs and compatibility issues with the windows tablet it's intended for. Fixing this should not pose a serious issue for someone well versed in C# and .net. All source code is available however the or...

$21 / hr (Avg Bid)

We need a set of construction drawings. The Floor plan has already been drawn in Chief Architect X9. We need The following: (T1.1)Title Sheet, (T1.2) General Notes & Specifications, (T24) Blank page for Title 24 Calcs & notes, (A1.1)Site Plan, (A1.2) Blank page for planting plan, (A2.1) First floor plan, (A2.2) Second floor plan, (A2.3) ROOF PLAN, (A2.4) REFLECTED CEILING PLAN - FIRST FLOOR (A2,5)REFLECTED CEILING PLAN - SECOND FLOOR, (A4.1) EXTERIOR ELEVATIONS, (A4.2) EXTERIOR ELEVATIONS, (A5.1) BUILDING SECTIONS, (A6.1) DETAILS, (A7.1) DOOR SCHEDULE, (A7.2) WINDOW SCHEDULE, (A7.3) CABINET SCHEDULE, (S1) GENERAL NOTES, (S2) TYPICAL DETAILS, (S3) FOUNDATION PLAN, (S4) LOWER ROOF/ SECOND FLOOR FRAMING PLAN, (S5) ROOF FRAMING PLAN, (S6)DETAILS, (S7) DETAILS, (S8) DETAILS

$27 / hr (Avg Bid)

Hi Edwin, I am looking for an expert Temenos Developer to help me integrate my Biometric Solution to the T24 Temenos R17 Core Banking Platform. The Biometric Device is a product of my own design and development which I have made with the aim of having it used as an additional security layer when a user is signing into their account. I have not worked with Temenos before so I require a competent individual who will first help me briefly understand the Temenos platform and how it works then I will require them to help me improve and integrate my Biometric solution to the Platform. My little research has revealed that Temenos Web Services will be the way to go for us because I want the System to be accessed via a Web Browser once the Biometric Devi...

$750 (Avg Bid)

Job Purpose We are looking for experienced Java software developers who can work as independent contractors. The business functionality of the Temenos T24 product is supported by a highly advanced and scalable technical architecture, which is aligned with modern technology standards for deployment and integration. The Technology group are responsible for the development and maintenance of this technical infrastructure. The successful contractors will become members of the Technology development team, using Agile development processes to deliver strategic initiatives across the four T24 Enterprise stacks (IBM, Oracle, Microsoft and Open). The successful contractors will use solid test-driven development methodologies to deliver high quality components in a c...

Hi TimHudspith, I noticed your profile and would like to discuss my project with you. I run a large business for Temenos but struggling to have a good MIS system which consolidates and distributes data efficiently. We can discuss any details over chat. I actually live in DB so could meet tonight if available.

Need California License PE for Mechanical and Electrical Engineer to drawing Electrical, Mechanical, Plumbing and Lighting T-24, Mechanical T-24. Project location in City of Dana Point. Answer City correction may require meeting with plan checker. Will give more details after reward the project. Anyone like to bid this project please send your qualifcation (resume), License number and your location. This is first test project we are looking for long term consultant work with us.

Account(Internal/Customer) List including Close Accounts(Based on Parameters) 2. Loans and Deposits 3. Money Market List 4. Customer Statement (Based On Dates and Account Number) 5. This is a reasonably simple graphic design job that should take less than half an hour. I need to upgrade the attached image file to conform with specification for the classifieds section of our local print newspaper: T24 (92 x 259.6), B24 (134 x 259.6), B26 (134 x 390.4), T42 (186 x 128.8), T21 (92 x 63.4) Also, if you are able to modernise the font and look it would be appreciated. It is in colour. Take a look at this website for the brand style we going for Please supply the finished artwork in several formats Gif, Jpeg, Pdf and Eps. Thank you for helping the United Nations Association of Australia charity
